page.title: 12STORNOWAY SOUTH - RADIO
page.content: From 30 Sept 1985 Radio Nan Eilean increased its broadcasting in Gaelic. This was fed into a new service: {Radio Nam Gaidheal. Combined output for that week was: {MON:}1700-1704 News; 1704-1733 Mairidh Gaol is Ceol; 1815-1900 Ceum Ur; 2210-2330 Caithris na h-Oidche {TUE:}0845-1000 Dealan-de; 1700-1704 News; 1704-1733 Ceol nan Eilean; 2210-2330 Caithris na h-Oidche {WED:}1700-1704 News; 1704-1733 This Week; 2210-2330 Caithris na h-Oidche {THUR:}1700-1704 News; 1704-1733 Cail san Amharc?; 2000-2030 Co Cuin Caite; 2210-2330 Caithris na h-Oidche {FRI:}0845-1000 Dealan-de; 1700-1704 News; 1704-1733 Co Cuin Caite; 1815-2000 Feasgar Di h-Aoine (with Inverness); 2210-0030 Caithris na h-Oidche.
